name: Wizhood: The Epic of Freedom
description:
He was a king who ruled his kingdom with peace justice and prosperity. People in luxury, everyone happy. But there was something reckoned without...
...Gorolks who ended great empires...

Game Traits

  • 15 Types Of Traps
  • legendary Soundtrack
  • 22 Levels
  • 20 Achievements
  • collectible Items
  • staf and Character Upgrade System
  • 2 Bosses

Enjoy An Adventrue-like story!
